info.title: Sedaro Satellite API
info.description:
Allows for consumption of Sedaro Satellite services.
Read more about Sedaro Satellite at [satellite.sedaro.com](https://satellite.sedaro.com).

epsOutputType.title: Power Supply Bus
epsOutputType.description: `CORE_OUTPUT` if connected to the regulated/unregulated Power Processor bus.  `BUS_REGULATOR` if connected to a constant voltage `BusRegulator` output.

busRegulator.title: ID of Associated BusRegulator Block
busRegulator.description: Relationship to zero or one `BusRegulator` blocks. Reverse key: `BusRegulator.loads`.

topology.title: ID of Associated Topology Block
topology.description: Relationship to zero or one `Topology` blocks. Reverse key: `Topology.loads`.

loadState.title: ID of Associated LoadState Block
loadState.description: Relationship to a `LoadState` block. Reverse key: `LoadState.loads`.

epsOutputType.title: Power Supply Bus
epsOutputType.description: `CORE_OUTPUT` if connected to the regulated/unregulated Power Processor bus.  `BUS_REGULATOR` if connected to a constant voltage `BusRegulator` output.

thermal_interface_B.title: IDs of Associated ThermalInterface Blocks

fieldOfView.title: ID of Associated FieldOfView Block
fieldOfView.description: Relationship to zero or one `FieldOfView` blocks. Reverse key: `FieldOfView.sensor`.

fieldOfView.title: ID of Associated FieldOfView Block
fieldOfView.description: Relationship to zero or one `FieldOfView` blocks. Reverse key: `FieldOfView.sensor`.

initialSoc.title: Initial SoC
initialSoc.description: This field may only be null when first created.

maxChargeCurrentOverride.title: Max Charge Current Override
maxChargeCurrentOverride.description: If null, the max charge current will be computed from the cell-pack composition.

maxDischargeCurrentOverride.title: Max Discharge Current Override
maxDischargeCurrentOverride.description: If null, the max discharge current will be computed from the cell-pack composition.

minSocOverride.title: Min SoC Override
minSocOverride.description: If null, the min state of charge will be computed from the cell-pack composition.

topology.title: ID of Associated Topology Block
topology.description: Relationship to a `Topology` block. Reverse key: `Topology.battery`.

packs.title: IDs of Associated BatteryPack Blocks
packs.description: Relationship to one or more `BatteryPack` blocks. Reverse key: `BatteryPack.battery`.

curve.title: SoC vs. Voc Curve
curve.description: Cell state of charge vs. open-circuit voltage curve. The first list should contain all SoC values in increasing order and the second should contain all Voc values [V].  Each Voc value must be greater than or equal to the prior value.

topology.title: ID of Associated Topology Block
topology.description: Relationship to a `Topology` block. Reverse key: `Topology.batteryCells`.

packs.title: IDs of Associated BatteryPack Blocks
packs.description: Relationship to one or more `BatteryPack` blocks. Reverse key: `BatteryPack.cell`.

inputType.description: The input source to the regulator. If `BUS_REGULATOR`, `inRegulator` must be defined.
